situation.title: Schools defined in § 16 of Act 561/2004 Coll.
situation.meta_description: In-person attendance of students in special schools is not allowed at least until November 20th, 2020.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

In-person attendance of students in special schools is not allowed until November 18th, 2020.

For the moment, students are being taught through distance education.

Special schools along with elementary schools are the priority. Therefore, the students will return to their classrooms as soon as the situation allows it.

links.title: This applies to special schools as defined in § 16 of the Education act
